title: Gravlax and smoked salmon starter
ingredients: ['400g gravlax (or fresh salmon)', '2 shallots, minced', '150ml crème fraîche', '1 onion, juiced', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 teaspoon prepared horseradish', '1 bunch dill, minced', 'pepper', '4 slices smoked salmon', "alfalfa, lamb's lettuce or rocket", 'chives']
